TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ItemContainerPattern extends System.Windows.Automation.BasePattern

Docs.summary: Represents an object that manages items and supports retrieving an item by property value.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement FindItemByProperty (System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement startAfter, System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperty property, object value);

.method public hidebysig instance class System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement FindItemByProperty(class System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement startAfter, class System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperty property, object value) cil managed
Public Function FindItemByProperty (startAfter As AutomationElement, property As AutomationProperty, value As Object) As AutomationElement

Docs.param: The item in the container after which to begin the search.
The property that contains the value to retrieve.
Docs.summary: Retrieves an element by the specified property value.
Docs.returns: The first item that matches the search criterion; otherwise, if no items match.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Set the `propertyId` parameter to `0` to retrieve the next item after `startAfter`, regardless of the value specified in `value`. Set `startAfter` to `null` to start the search with the first item.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Pattern As AutomationPattern

remarks.format:
## Remarks This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications. UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SynchronizedInputPatternIdentifiers>.
The pattern identifier is passed to methods, such as <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCurrentPattern%2A>, to retrieve the control pattern of interest from the specified <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>.
